exposes.description: Remaining battery in %, can take up to 24 hours before reported
exposes.label: Battery
exposes.name: battery

exposes.description: Direction in which the dial was turned
exposes.label: Action direction
exposes.name: action_direction

exposes.description: Type of the rotation, value in the first message is `step` and in the next messages value is `rotate`
exposes.label: Action type
exposes.name: action_type

exposes.description: value in seconds representing the amount of time the last action took
exposes.label: Action time
exposes.name: action_time

exposes.description: Raw rotation state value of the dial which represents brightness from 0-255
exposes.label: Brightness
exposes.name: brightness

exposes.description: amount of steps the last action took on the dial exposed as a posive value from 0-255
exposes.label: Action step size
exposes.name: action_step_size

options.description: Simulate a brightness value. If this device provides a brightness_move_up or brightness_move_down action it is possible to specify the update interval and delta. The action_brightness_delta indicates the delta for each interval.
options.label: Simulated brightness
options.name: simulated_brightness

definition.description: E14 candle, dimmable with, color temp

features.description: Color temperature after cold power on of this light
features.label: Color temp startup
features.name: color_temp_startup

presets.description: Restore previous color_temp on cold power on
presets.name: previous

exposes.description: Triggers an effect on the light (e.g. make light blink for a few seconds)
exposes.label: Effect
exposes.name: effect

exposes.description: Controls the behavior when the device is powered on after power loss
exposes.label: Power-on behavior
exposes.name: power_on_behavior

options.description: Controls the transition time (in seconds) of on/off, brightness, color temperature (if applicable) and color (if applicable) changes. Defaults to `0` (no transition).
options.label: Transition
options.name: transition

options.description: When enabled colors will be synced, e.g. if the light supports both color x/y and color temperature a conversion from color x/y to color temperature will be done when setting the x/y color (default true).
options.label: Color sync
options.name: color_sync

options.description: State actions will also be published as 'action' when true (default false).
options.label: State action
options.name: state_action

options.description: Calibrates the temperature value (absolute offset), takes into effect on next report of device.
options.label: Temperature calibration
options.name: temperature_calibration

options.description: Number of digits after decimal point for temperature, takes into effect on next report of device. This option can only decrease the precision, not increase it.
options.label: Temperature precision
options.name: temperature_precision

options.description: Calibrates the humidity value (absolute offset), takes into effect on next report of device.
options.label: Humidity calibration
options.name: humidity_calibration

options.description: Number of digits after decimal point for humidity, takes into effect on next report of device. This option can only decrease the precision, not increase it.
options.label: Humidity precision
options.name: humidity_precision

exposes.label: Countdown
exposes.name: countdown

exposes.label: Child lock
exposes.name: child_lock

options.description: Calibrates the power value (percentual offset), takes into effect on next report of device.
options.label: Power calibration
options.name: power_calibration

options.description: Number of digits after decimal point for power, takes into effect on next report of device. This option can only decrease the precision, not increase it.
options.label: Power precision
options.name: power_precision

options.label: Current calibration
options.name: current_calibration

options.label: Current precision

options.label: Voltage calibration
options.name: voltage_calibration

options.label: Voltage precision

options.description: Calibrates the energy value (percentual offset), takes into effect on next report of device.
options.label: Energy calibration
options.name: energy_calibration

options.description: Number of digits after decimal point for energy, takes into effect on next report of device. This option can only decrease the precision, not increase it.
options.label: Energy precision

options.label: Identify timeout
